name: Escape_Player
_source: s;Alpin;We're so close, now...{w} Keep your head on, Alpin.{w} You're almost out.{w} J-just...{w} breathe.{w} Breathe, and run.
s;Shayla;They couldn't stop us if they tried!{w} And this sure as hell better not be what it looks like when they try!
s;Raelin;The fighting never ends, does it...?{w} Even this close to getting out, there's still more fighting...{w} Hard to believe it'll ever stop.
s;Carlin;Grandfather...{w} I'm close.{w} Just a few more steps, and I'm free.{w} Just stay with me a little longer...
s;Elwynn;...{w} Can't help but wonder if we even really stand a chance, here.{w} We're so close, but it feels so far...{w} doesn't matter, I guess.{w} Just gotta keep fighting.
s;Saraid;Alright, let's make tracks...{w} Damn it.{w} So many people dead, and all I can do is run...
s;Quinley;Alright!{w} Call that another win for ol' Quinley!{w} Let's keep this up!{w} I don't wanna think about what'll happen if I break my lucky streak...
s;Lamonte;Eislinn...{w} I wonder if we'll ever get the chance to rebuild.{w} Hah...{w} Guess all I can do for now is make sure these people get out alive.
s;Garvey;Tch.{w} I am not dying in this backwater sty.{w} Not today, at least.{w} I refuse to let this be how it ends.
s;Elspeth;...{w} Is this...{w} enough?{w} Goddess, if you can hear me, please tell me...{w} Am I doing enough for these people?
s;Orla;You imperial bastards...{w} you're not getting the best of me.{w} Not today.{w} Eislinn can burn all she likes{semicolon}{w} I'm not letting her be my funeral pyre.
s;Ailsa;...{w} Raelin...{w} I'm still here.{w} I don't know how much longer we'll make it, but...{w} I'm still here.{w} And I'm not leaving without you.
s;Corridon;Thought I was done fighting...{w} Goddess willing, this'll be my last.
s;Laisren;Goddess, you've got a cruel sense of humour.{w} I'm not leaving alone.{w} I'd rather die fighting than run when my brother still needs me.{w} I will find him.
update_achievement;24;Mom, Can We Keep Him?;Escaped with a Thrall in Ch4
